name: One Way Or Another
description:
This game was made for my last game jam. It is my first UE4 game. 

We were two partners in the team. I made the entire game but the 3D models (made by my partner) and the animations which we took from ue4 market place.

Our porpouse was to copy One Finger Death Punch game but adding more features. It end up being a prototype.

Check out my portfolio: https://mfmdxyz.wixsite.com/migueldev?lang=es
